text: The new analytics dashboard is incredibly intuitive! Love the customizable reports. It's a game changer for our team. The predictive features are surprisingly accurate.
I'm experiencing frequent errors when trying to export large datasets. The system freezes. This is impacting my workflow significantly.
Good product overall. The AI insights are helpful, but the onboarding process was a bit confusing. Could be smoother.
I wish there were more integration options with other CRM tools. Currently, it's a manual export/import for me. Also, the mobile app is lacking features.
Excellent customer support and the predictive churn model saved us a lot of money last quarter. Highly recommend!
